update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT
SCENIC_SPOT_NAME = #{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT = #{scenicSpotContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE = #{scenicSpotPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL = #{scenicSpotEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES = #{scenicSpotAddres,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD = #{scenicSpotCloseword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE = #{scenicSpotWeekendRentPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE = #{scenicSpotNormalRentPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME = #{scenicSpotNormalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME = #{scenicSpotRemainingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME = #{scenicSpotRentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COORDINATE_RANGE = #{coordinateRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT = #{scenicSpotDeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE = #{normalCappedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE = #{weekendCappedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME = #{randomBroadcastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS = #{robotWakeupWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_FID = #{scenicSpotFid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY = #{scenicSpotFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME = #{scenicSpotFenceTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME = #{scenicSpotForbiddenZoneTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME = #{formalOperationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_OPERATION_TIME = #{stopOperationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TIME =#{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSING_TIME =#{closingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_BROADCAST =#{workBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSING_BROADCAST =#{closingBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HUNT_SWITCH =#{huntSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
HORN_SWITCH = #{hornSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPEAT_STATUS = #{repeatStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HUNT_QUANTITY = #{huntQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAMP_OPENING_TIME = #{lampOpeningTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAMP_CLOSING_TIME = #{lampClosingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREE_TIME_SETTING =#{freeTimeSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAT =#{heat,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SETTLEMENT_METHOD =#{settlementMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOLIDAY_STRING = #{holidayString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMALL_NETWORK = #{smallNetwork,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
TREASURE_COOLDOWN_TIME =#{treasureCooldownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COOLDOWN_TIME =#{cooldownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTO_UPDATE_MONITOR =#{autoUpdateMonitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT

select
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT where ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS in (1)

select
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT
SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{spotId}
and ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS in (1,3)
SELECT * FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT WHERE SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS = '10' AND PAUSE_STATE = '1' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ROBOT_TOTAL, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_OPENWORD, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_BEYOND_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME, sss.COORDINATE_RANGE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT, sss.NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE, sss.WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE, sss.RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME, sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER, sss.CREATE_DATE, sss.UPDATE_DATE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FID, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, sss.TEST_START_TIME, sss.TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, sss.FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, sss.STOP_OPERATION_TIME, sss.COMPANY_ID, sss.PAUSE_STATE, sss.WORK_TIME, sss.CLOSING_TIME, sss.PAUSE_BROADCAST, sss.WORK_BROADCAST, sss.CLOSING_BROADCAST, sss.LAMP_OPENING_TIME, sss.LAMP_CLOSING_TIME, sss.LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME, sss.FREE_TIME_SETTING, sss.HUNT_SWITCH, sss.HUNT_QUANTITY, sss.HEAT, sss.HORN_SWITCH, sss.REPEAT_STATUS, ssscp.SCENIC_SPOT_ID, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_ONE_TIME, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_ONE_PRICE, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_TWO_TIME, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_TWO_PRICE, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_TWO_UNIT_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_TIME, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_TIME, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_TIME, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_UNIT_PRICE FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CAP_PRICE ssscp ON sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = ssscp.SCENIC_SPOT_ID WHERE sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId}

SELECT sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ROBOT_TOTAL, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_OPENWORD, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_BEYOND_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME, sss.COORDINATE_RANGE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT, sss.NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE, sss.WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE, sss.RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME, sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER, sss.CREATE_DATE, sss.UPDATE_DATE, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FID, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, sss.TEST_START_TIME, sss.TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, sss.FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, sss.STOP_OPERATION_TIME, sss.COMPANY_ID, sss.PAUSE_STATE, sss.WORK_TIME, sss.CLOSING_TIME, sss.PAUSE_BROADCAST, sss.WORK_BROADCAST, sss.CLOSING_BROADCAST, sss.LAMP_OPENING_TIME, sss.LAMP_CLOSING_TIME, sss.LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME, sss.FREE_TIME_SETTING, sss.HUNT_SWITCH, sss.HUNT_QUANTITY, sss.HEAT, sss.HORN_SWITCH, sss.REPEAT_STATUS, ssscp.SCENIC_SPOT_ID, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_ONE_TIME, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_ONE_PRICE, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_TWO_TIME, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_TWO_PRICE, ssscp.NORMAL_CAP_TWO_UNIT_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_TIME, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_TIME, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_TIME, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_PRICE, ssscp.WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_UNIT_PRICE FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CAP_PRICE ssscp ON sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = ssscp.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
SELECT COUNT(SCENIC_SPOT_ID) FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT
SELECT * FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT where FIND_IN_SET(ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, #{i})
select SCENIC_SPOT_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT
select SCENIC_SPOT_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT

select SCENIC_SPOT_ID,SCENIC_SPOT_NAME,HUNT_SWITCH from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT
1=1
and SCENIC_SPOT_ID =#{scenicSpotId}
ORDER BY HUNT_SWITCH DESC, SCENIC_SPOT_ID ASC
